# mobileNetworkCode

**Instance Property**

The Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the private LTE network.

## Declaration

```swift
var mobileNetworkCode: String { get set }
```

## Accessing network properties

- **mobileCountryCode**: The Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the private LTE network.
- **trackingAreaCode**: The Tracking Area Code of the private LTE network.
